header.title: CosPropertyService_PropertyNamesIterator

erlref.modulesummary: This module implements the OMG CosPropertyService::PropertyNamesIterator interface.

description.p:
To get access to the record definitions for the structures use:
-include_lib("cosProperty/include/CosPropertyService.hrl").

func.name: reset(Iterator) -> ok
func.fsummary: Reset the position to the first property name

desc.p: This operation resets the position to the first property name.

func.name: next_one(Iterator) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Return true if a Property Name exists at the current position and the out parameter is a valid Property Name. Otherwise false and a non-valid Property Name

desc.p: This operation returns true if a Property Name exists at the current position and the out parameter is a valid Property Name. If false is returned the out parameter is a non-valid Property Name.

func.name: next_n(Iterator, HowMany) -> Reply
func.fsummary: Return HowManyProperty Names and a boolean which is true if additional Property Names exists

desc.p: This operation returns true if the requested number of Property Names can be delivered and there are additional property names. If false is returned a sequence of max HowMany property names will be returned and no more Property Names can be delivered.
This operation will terminate the Iterator and all subsequent calls will fail.
